subject: Re: [samuraihistory] request information on yumi bow
msgSnippet: Hi! You may want to contact Don Szymanski of the Ryuko Kyudojo in Boulder, Colorado.  I know that he spent a number of years in Japan learning to make bows.

Hi!

You may want to contact Don Szymanski of the Ryuko Kyudojo in Boulder, 
Colorado.  I know that he spent a number of years in Japan learning to make 
bows.  The dojo website may even have some links to books.  Also try:

www.zenko.org

Shannon
